extension.description: OpenClaw AI Assistant for VS Code - Chat with AI, reference files with @, apply code changes directly
config.title: OpenClaw
config.openclawPath.description: Path to openclaw binary (auto-detected if empty). Example: C:\\Users\\you\\AppData\\Roaming\\npm\\openclaw.cmd
config.autoRefreshInterval.description: Auto-refresh interval in milliseconds (0 to disable)
config.autoRefreshInterval.markdownDescr:
Auto-refresh session history interval (milliseconds).

- `0`: Disable auto-refresh
- `5000`: Refresh every 5 seconds
- `10000`: Refresh every 10 seconds (default)
- `30000`: Refresh every 30 seconds
config.enableCliFallback.description: Enable CLI command fallback when WebSocket fails (for debugging). When disabled, only WebSocket mode is used.
config.planModePrompt.description: Custom prompt for Plan Mode. Leave empty to use the built-in default. The ---- Plan Mode ---- markers are added automatically.
config.gatewayToken.description: Gateway authentication token. Required for WSL or remote environments where the config file cannot be read automatically.
config.gatewayToken.markdownDescription:
Gateway authentication token.

Set this when VSCode cannot read `~/.openclaw/openclaw.json` automatically (e.g. WSL on Windows).

Find your token in `~/.openclaw/openclaw.json` → `gateway.auth.token`.
command.openChatPanel.title: Open Chat Panel
command.sendSelection.title: Send Selection to OpenClaw
command.sendFile.title: Send File to OpenClaw
command.togglePlanMode.title: Toggle Plan Mode
command.newSession.title: New Session
command.clearChat.title: Clear Chat
command.showConnectionStatus.title: Show Connection Status
command.closeChat.title: Close Chat
